patthana21.55:1.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:2.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:3.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:4.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:5.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:6.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:7.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:8.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:9.1_0: Nasavitakkaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:10.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:11.1_0: Nasavicāraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avicāro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:12.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:13.1_0: Nasappītikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:14.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:15.1_0: Napītisahagataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:16.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:17.1_0: Nasukhasahagataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:18.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:19.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:20.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:21.1_0: Nakāmāvacaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kāmāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:22.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:23.1_0: Narūpāvacaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:24.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:25.1_0: Naarūpāvacaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:26.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:27.1_0: Napariyāpannaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pariyāpanno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:28.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:29.1_0: Naniyyānikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyyāniko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:30.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:31.1_0: Naniyataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:32.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:33.1_0: Nasauttaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:34.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:35.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:36.1_0: Naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:37.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:38.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:39.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:41.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:42.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana21.55:42.1_2: naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:46.1_0: Nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.55:46.1_1: Naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:47.1_1: adhipatiyā dve …pe… sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme dve, vipāke ekaṁ,
patthana21.55:47.1_2: āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:48.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
